biotools.summary: A web server of a dual-model approach, support vector machines (SVM) and a Mahalanobis distance discriminant (MD), to infer potential hosts of coronaviruses based on mononucleotide and dinucleotide biases of spike gene of coronaviruses.

bioschemas.name: Seq2Hosts
bioschemas.summary: A web server of a dual-model approach, support vector machines (SVM) and a Mahalanobis distance discriminant (MD), to infer potential hosts of coronaviruses based on mononucleotide and dinucleotide biases of spike gene of coronaviruses.
